mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
/*from (SELECT bhv.organization_id LOCATION_ID, (select organization_code from wos_organizations where organization_id = bhv.organization_id) LOCATION_CODE, (select organization_name from wos_organizations where organization_id = bhv.organization_id) LOCATION_NAME, bhv.branch_id, wo.organization_name AS branch_name FROM branch_hierarchy_v bhv, wos_organizations wo, wos_organization_versions wov WHERE wo.organization_id = bhv.branch_id and bhv.organization_id = wov.organization_id and WOV.LEVEL_CODE ='POS' and BRANCH_ID =)*/ from (SELECT wl.location_id LOCATION_ID, wl.location_code LOCATION_CODE, wl.location_name LOCATION_NAME from wos_locations wl inner join wos_location_versions wlv on wlv.location_id = wl.location_id and TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to where branch_owner_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

/*select distinct count(*) from (SELECT bhv.organization_id LOCATION_ID, (select organization_code from wos_organizations where organization_id = bhv.organization_id) LOCATION_CODE, (select organization_name from wos_organizations where organization_id = bhv.organization_id) LOCATION_NAME, bhv.branch_id, wo.organization_name AS branch_name FROM branch_hierarchy_v bhv, wos_organizations wo, wos_organization_versions wov WHERE wo.organization_id = bhv.branch_id and bhv.organization_id = wov.organization_id and WOV.LEVEL_CODE ='POS' and BRANCH_ID =)*/ select count(*) from (SELECT wl.location_id LOCATION_ID, wl.location_code LOCATION_CODE, wl.location_name LOCATION_NAME from wos_locations wl inner join wos_location_versions wlv on wlv.location_id = wl.location_id and TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to where branch_owner_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
/*from (SELECT bhv.organization_id LOCATION_ID, (select organization_code from wos_organizations where organization_id = bhv.organization_id) LOCATION_CODE, (select organization_name from wos_organizations where organization_id = bhv.organization_id) LOCATION_NAME, bhv.branch_id, wo.organization_name AS branch_name FROM branch_hierarchy_v bhv, wos_organizations wo, wos_organization_versions wov WHERE wo.organization_id = bhv.branch_id and bhv.organization_id = wov.organization_id and WOV.LEVEL_CODE ='POS' and BRANCH_ID =)*/ from (SELECT wl.location_id LOCATION_ID, wl.location_code LOCATION_CODE, wl.location_name LOCATION_NAME from wos_locations wl inner join wos_location_versions wlv on wlv.location_id = wl.location_id and TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to where branch_owner_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
order by LOCATION_NAME asc
